title: 多世界无法创建世界，每次重启世界就失效……
author: fmy19960827
txt_content:
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]: net.minecraft.world.MinecraftException: The save folder for world .\world\dao is being accessed from another location, aborting
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveHandler.func_75762_c(SaveHandler.java:99)
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72906_B(World.java:4273)
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_73042_a(WorldServer.java:1043)
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_73044_a(WorldServer.java:1009)
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71267_a(MinecraftServer.java:530)
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71260_j(MinecraftServer.java:582)
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:729)
[20:58:43] [Server thread/WARN]:  at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

这是后台的报错……每次创建世界后重启世界就失效了 不知道为啥 一共8个世界 服务器为1710KC端1614.200

replies.author: chyr
replies.txt_content:
在world文件夹把以前创新但后来删除的地图文件夹删掉
然后重启服务器再试试创建新世界 /mv create XXX normal
